body.p: An entity revalues property, plant and equipment (under the revaluation model treatment in IAS 16 Property, Plant and Equipment) but no equivalent adjustment is made for tax purposes. (note: paragraph 61A of the Standard requires the related deferred tax to be recognised in other comprehensive income.)
